title: reverseWildCardFilterFactory returns reversed node
description: Searching docs using double wildcards i.e. fre returns normal results: "Freedom", as well as reversed nodes: "Interfax". Using NGramFilterFactory is not an option because the field being searched can be extremely large and this would create a tremendous amount of tokens.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: There is likely some configuration missing from the description, but I can't figure out what it might be - as stated, I can't reproduce this using Solr 7.2, so resolving. Please reopen if more information can be provided.
